a.n: Bol Dâ€™Or 2016, The Swiss Do It Better

p.k: A landlocked nation that sits on top of the sailing world with multiple successes whether in the Olympic, Offshore or in Grand Prix Racing formats, and few can boast two America's Cup victories. The Bol D'Or is a symbolic race bringing together the very best of Switzerland's sailing tradition. It's a national treasure that every summer gathers thousands to the shores of Lake Geneva since 1939.
